ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for subjects which identifies a subject in NDAR
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging was completed
Notes: * '01/01/1900' indicates that a date associated with retrospective data is not known.

ElementDescription: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month If the research participant is 13 days old at time of interview  the appropriate value would be 0 months if the participant is 19 days old the value would be 1 month

ElementDescription: Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
